Package com.capgemini.cobigen.impl.config.upgrade

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractConfigurationUpgrader<VERSIONS_TYPE extends Enum<?>>
    This class encompasses all logic for upgrading CobiGen configurations including detection of all released schema compatibilities upgrading legacy configurations to the latest supported version
    ConfigurationUpgradeResult
    Result object encompassing all results from a configuration upgrade step.
    ContextConfigurationUpgrader
    This class encompasses all logic for legacy context configuration detection and upgrading these to the latest supported version.
    TemplateConfigurationUpgrader
    This class encompasses all logic for legacy templates configuration detection and upgrading these to the latest supported version.
